summary: This document contains due diligence research results for an individual named Harry Beller, focusing on compliance checks related to anti-money laundering (AML) standards. The report indicates that no significant negative media or alerts were found in the databases searched, and it includes various personal and property records associated with Beller.

keyFacts: Harry Beller is the subject of due diligence research with no significant negative media or alerts found.
The report includes various personal records, including property ownership and vehicle registrations.
Harry Beller has multiple relatives mentioned in the document, including Naomi, Steven, Samuel, Hanna, and Sharon Beller.
A court case involving Harry Beller against Ramapo Town was disposed of on November 3, 2017.
